abstract: The campaign of Rick Santorum brought in $704,199 for the quarter but spent $743,757. Still, the fund-raising in the quarter marked an improvement from the previous quarter.
snippet: The campaign of Rick Santorum brought in $704,199 for the quarter but spent $743,757. Still, the fund-raising in the quarter marked an improvement from the previous quarter.
lead_paragraph: Former Senator Rick Santorum released campaign finance figures late Friday that illuminated his precarious cash situation. His campaign spent more money than the candidate raised.

headline.main: Santorum Spends More Than He Raises
